archimate:BusinessEvent.name: ADV009 Exploit design or configuration issues in an organisation’s remote access service (e.g. VPNs)
archimate:BusinessEvent.documentation:
The threat takes advantage of design or configuration issues in how remote access is handled for an organisation.
Assessment guidance: This threat event can include exploiting: ԉ ‘split tunnelling’ to gain access to organisational networks ԉ vulnerabilities in the way authentication is handled ԉ weak encryption.
